title: Bloomberg Markets: Abercrombie & Fitch Plunges, Coke Endowments
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Abercrombie & Fitch Plunges, Coke Endowments
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUESTS: Lindsey Rupp Specialty Retail Reporter Bloomberg News Discussing Abercrombie & Fitch terminating takeover talks with Poonam Goyal, Bloomberg Intelligence Senior U.S. Retail Analyst. Janet Lorin Higher Education Reporter Bloomberg News Discussing how Coke pays dividends for some college endowments.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
